metadata.title: CVE-2014-9901 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm Wi-Fi driver in Android before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 7 (2013)devices makes incorrect snprintf calls, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via crafted frames, akaAndroid internal bug 28670333 and Qualcomm internal bug CR548711.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
